content: add soft texture and functionality to your home this simple basket can be as tall or as short as you like and can be completed with those spare yarn balls it is worked in the round with simple stitches experiment with color changes to make this basket all your own basket approximate dimensions 3 5 high x 4 wide medium weight yarn 1 oz or 45 yards skill level beginner standard us terms used chain half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch gauge 14 half_double_crochet x 12 row = 4x4 inch square swatch materials used caron one pound yarn soft grey mix was used in the picture us i/9 00mm crochet hook tapestry needle thank you for stopping by and check back soon for new patterns all pictures and patterns copyright to cocoabe designs ©
